title: Power Finance Corporation Ltd eases for fifth straight session - Business Standard
content: Power Finance Corporation Ltd eases for fifth straight session  Business Standard
description: Power Finance Corporation Ltd is quoting at Rs 112, down 1.06% on the day as on 13:19 IST on the NSE. The stock jumped 0.99% in last one year as compared to a 10.4% rally in NIFTY and a 0.57% spurt in the Nifty Financial Services index.
